import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; import ReactHtmlParser from "react-html-parser"; import { CKEditor } from "@ckeditor/ckeditor5-react"; import ClassicEditor from "@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FcCamera, FcVideoCall } from "react-icons/fc"; import Heading from '../Heading'; function Posts(props) { const userID = props.userID; const [viewProfile, setViewProfile] = useState("avatar/male.svg"); useEffect(() => { Axios.get( `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/home/userProfile/` + userID ).then((response) => { const profileDetail1 = response.data[0]; const profileDetail2 = response.data[1]; var profile; if (profileDetail1.length === 0) { if (profileDetail2[0].gender === "Male") { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/avatar/male.svg`; setViewProfile(profile); } else { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/avatar/female.svg`; setViewProfile(profile); } } else { profile = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/public/Assests/Images/user/` + profileDetail1[0].profile_photo; setViewProfile(profile); } }); }, [userID]); return ( <>
{ const data = editor.getData(); setPostText(data); }} /> {postImage && (
)} {postVideo && (
)} Photos Videos
) } export default Posts
